The claim is based on a meme posted on t: wing "Minutemen Militia" Facebook page, which asserted that "Muslim immigrants" were responsible for the majority of knife attacks in London.
The meme did not provide any sources to: making it difficult to verify its authenticity.
The figure of 13: 000 knife attacks mentioned in the meme is likely taken from news reports surrounding the UK Office for National Statistics' release of a statistical bulletin on crime in England and Wales.
However: the ONS spokesperson confirmed that there is no evidence to support the notion that the vast majority of knife crimes in London were committed by Muslim immigrants.
